property.name: grantType
property.description: The method by which an application gets an access token (e.g., 'password', 'refresh_token').

property.name: scopes
property.description: A collection of permission scopes that define the access rights of a token or user.

property.name: tokenType
property.description: The type of token issued, typically "Bearer".

property.name: expiresIn
property.description: The duration in seconds for which an access token is valid.

property.name: accessToken
property.description: The token used for authenticating API requests.

property.name: refreshToken
property.description: A token used to obtain a new access token when the current one expires.

property.name: requestApplication
property.description: The application making the request.

property.name: oauthRequest
property.description: A data object containing all parameters for an OAuth authentication request.

property.name: requestContext
property.description: The context of a request.

property.name: oauthResponse
property.description: The response from an OAuth authentication request, containing tokens and status.

property.name: resources
property.description: A collection of data entities in a REST API.

property.name: httpStatus
property.description: The HTTP status code of a response.

property.name: errors
property.description: A collection of error objects.

property.name: attributes
property.description: A set of key-value pairs describing a product or entity.

property.name: type
property.description: The type or category of an entity (e.g., 'allow', 'deny', 'page').

property.name: status
property.description: A HTTP status code.

property.name: code
property.description: A Spryker specific error code.

property.name: message
property.description: A message providing information, success, or error details.

property.name: isValid
property.description: A boolean flag indicating if a token or request is valid.

property.name: error
property.description: An error message or object describing a problem that occurred.

property.name: message
property.description: A message providing information, success, or error details.

property.name: errorType
property.description: A string indicating the category or type of an error.

property.name: action
property.description: The specific action to be performed, often within a controller.

property.name: isValid
property.description: A boolean flag indicating if a token or request is valid.

property.name: requestWarehouse
property.description: The warehouse associated with a request.

property.name: meta
property.description: A collection of metadata.

property.name: requestUser
property.description: The user associated with a request.

property.name: post
property.description: An annotation or configuration for the 'create' (POST) action of a resource.

property.name: oauthScopes
property.description: A collection of permission scopes associated with an OAuth token.

property.name: oauthUserId
property.description: The unique identifier for a user within the OAuth system.

property.name: entity
property.description: The type of entity being referenced or processed in an authorization context (e.g., 'user', 'order').

property.name: data
property.description: A generic data payload.

property.name: warehouseUserAssignmentConditions
property.description: Conditions for filtering warehouse user assignments.

property.name: userUuids
property.description: A collection of user UUIDs.

property.name: isActive
property.description: A boolean flag indicating if an entity is currently active.

property.name: warehouseUserAssignments
property.description: A collection of warehouse user assignments.

property.name: warehouse
property.description: A warehouse or stock location.

property.name: naturalIdentifier
property.description: A human-readable unique identifier for a resource, such as a user's email.

property.name: channelName
property.description: The name of the logging or communication channel.
